1079020.name: Sloth: Heart to Heart Demo
1079020.description:
Japan, Kyushu Prefecture. 1969

Rouella Kromowidjojo is a genetic anomaly, a living dialysis machine who can cure almost all forms of disease through the process of crosstransfusion. For the next 15 hours, she will connect with her next patient: the mysterious Rei Fukugawa, whose emaciation and jaundice seem to hide something much more fatal.



Sloth: Heart to Heart is a short and casual Kinetic Visual Novel geared toward Sci-Fi fans. The game romanticizes the medical practice of exchange transfusion to showcase the side effect of a seemingly normal procedure in a seemingly normal pair of characters. Themes include evolutionary psychology, personal obligation, and intersubjectivity.

GAME FEATURES

♥ 3-4 Hours Of Gameplay

♥ 10+ High Quality CGs
♥ 10+ Ambient Soundtrack That Fits In Every Scene
♥ 3DCG Backgrounds That Changes Per Scene
♥ ...and More.
